name: ReversEm - Multiplayer
description:
Play ReversEm against other people from all over the world. ReversEm is a strategy game where the goal is to capture more squares than your opponent. You capture the squares by surrounding your opponents disks and turning them into your colored disks. The player with the most colored disks is the winner of the game.

Features:
Play online against other players
Chat in game
Leader boards
Friend list
Three board sizes, 6x6, 8x8 and 10x10.
Multiple board colors
Multiple disk images

Play many games at the same time, play at your convenience. This is a notification based game, you will get notifications when its your turn, invited to a game, new messages and so on.
